EmailLogs.Subject: Grant Agreement for Signature by EO  - CBPF-UKR-23-R-INGO-24494
EmailLogs.Message:
CBPF Code: CBPF-UKR-23-R-INGO-24494

Project Title: Provision of emergency life-saving shelter and NFI assistance to conflict-affected communities and newly accessible areas in the east of Ukraine.


Dear OCHA FCS Finance,

Please note that the Grant Agreement for the above project signed by the HC and IP is available to FCS for final signature by the Executive Officer (EO).

Kindly proceed with clearance and submission to the EO for final signature. Once signed, please scan and upload into GMS, and proceed with disbursement.

Should you experience difficulties please, contact the OCHA HFU for further assistance.


Thank you

OCHA HFU 


Note: This is an automatic email notification from GMS system, please do not reply.


Actions/next steps:

OCHA FCS Finance proceed with final signature of the Grant Agreement by EO; when ready, upload on the GMS a scanned copy and proceed to disbursement.
